comment.body:
下载最新的ZeroNet
听说那个问题已经被修理好了
@Iusepython: 说实话我也不知道,我本身不再中国不能尝试,恐怕帮不上,非常抱歉

You can always use a site like http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n/ rumors said there's auto seeding bots there that will help you,
or just post it here and most likely people will do it for you

maybe posting in mandarin will get more attention
okay maybe not as 
>Required language skills: Spoken and written fluency in Mandarin and working proficiency in English.
probably have to fiddle with the config that can be found on running the exe with `--help`

as far as i know, yes as we still need that to find peers
we have plans to use DHT tho
